title: Josh Navidi ruled out of Wales' remaining Rugby World Cup fixtures with hamstring injury
text:
Wales are set to call up an extra back to replace the injured Josh Navidi who has been ruled out of the rest of the World Cup with the hamstring injury he sustained in Sunday’s 20-19 quarter-final win over France.

With concerns over both Hadleigh Parkes and Jonathan Davies ahead of this Sunday’s semi-final against South Africa in Yokohama, Gatland is likely to bring in either a centre or an outside back as cover.

Ospreys centre Scott Williams would be by far the most experienced option but he has not played a lot of rugby recently, returning this season from a long-term back injury...
description: Wales are set to call up an extra back to replace the injured Josh Navidi who has been ruled out of the rest of the World Cup with the hamstring injury he sustained in Sunday’s 20-19 quarter-final win over France.
